Created by @Ruben Van de Velde (@Ruben-VandeVelde) on 2023-06-21
Labels: lean4-change-in-behaviour

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

The issue description doesn't have any examples that weren't working â€” I think it's about scoped notation3 and scoped[NS] notation3, which both appear to work now, so I've closed the issue.

If there's something else wrong, we can add some test cases and reopen it.
